title: Charlton v Chelsea: FA Cup third round - live
description: Minute-by-minute report: Join Rob Smyth as Championship Charlton take on London rivals Chelsea for a place in the FA Cup fourth round
content:
I’m really excited and proud to be head coach of this football club. It’s felt like three weeks, not three days and I’m really looking forward to the game. Hopefully we put in a really good performance.

title: Afcon roundup: Victor Osimhen sends Nigeria past Algeria to reach semi-finals
description: Goals from Victor Osimhen and Akor Adams secured a 2-0 win for Nigeria against Algeria to set up a semi-final against Africa Cup of Nations hosts Morocco
content:
Strikers Victor Osimhen and Akor Adams grabbed second-half goals as Nigeria powered to a deserved 2-0 victory against Algeria in Saturday’s Africa Cup of Nations quarter-final to set up a meeting with the hosts Morocco in the last four.
Osimhen steer... [2737 chars]

title: 'Operational issues' causing water disruption across Maidstone
description: A series of burst mains and disruption from Storm Goretti has caused problems for South East Water.
content:
Thousands of residents across parts of Maidstone are without water and could face disruption all weekend, South East Water (SEW) has said.
The company's customers in "Hollingbourne, right through to Headcorn and the surrounding villages" have been to... [2316 chars]

title: Newcastle 3-3 (7-6 pens) Bournemouth: Aaron Ramsdale saves three penalties in shootout win
description: Aaron Ramsdale saves three penalties in a dramatic shootout as Newcastle United defeat Bournemouth to reach the FA Cup fourth round in a thrilling cup tie.
content:
Aaron Ramsdale saved three penalties in a dramatic shootout as Newcastle United defeated Bournemouth to reach the FA Cup fourth round.
The former Bournemouth goalkeeper came back to haunt his former side and denied Evanilson, Alex Jimenez and, finall... [2695 chars]

title: Police seize two tonnes of cannabis in Blackrod farm raid
description: Greater Manchester Police says it believes it is one of the largest single UK seizures of its kind.
content:
Police have recovered about two tonnes of cannabis from a tenement farm in what is believed to be one of the largest ever seizures of its kind in the UK.
Bagfuls of the class B drug with an estimated street value of about £24m were seized from a prop... [552 chars]
